content.value:
OK! Here's how to completely remove the Trending section of Twitter *without* having to install plugins, adblockers, CSS, or apps.
Visit twitter.com/settings/trends
Set your location to China 
China only has one trend: "Beijing"
Tap "I'm not interested in this"
ðŸ¥³ Trends is now gone
content.html: OK! Here's how to completely remove the Trending section of Twitter *without* having to install plugins, adblockers, CSS, or apps. Visit twitter.com/settings/trends Set your location to China China only has one trend: "Beijing" Tap "I'm not interested in this" ðŸ¥³ Trends is now gone

photo.alt: Twitter settings screen. Explore locations is set to China.
The only trending topic is Beijing.
Pop up saying "Not interested in this".
A blank "Trends for you" box on the website.
